description: If you're looking for a cocktail with some great benefits, try the&nbsp;Devil Cocktail. One of this drink's main ingredients is cayenne pepper, which increases blood flow and helps transport nutrients to the skin. Adding cayenne to your&nbsp;diet can help create a smoother and plumper complexion!
